definition: miliaria (type of skin disease)/prickly heat/sweat rash

son/child/seed/egg/small thing/1st earthly branch: 11 p.m.-1 a.m., midnight, 11th solar month (7th December to 5th January), year of the Rat/Viscount, fourth of five orders of nobility 五等爵位[wu3 deng3 jue2 wei4]/ancient Chinese compass point: 0° (north)

sentences.english: The summer why the skin always is crawly , is suspicion allergy or prickly heat?
sentences.chinese: 夏季为何皮肤总是痒痒，怀疑是过敏还是痱子？

sentences.english: Sometimes it seems as if baking soda is good for just about anything, and it's certainly good for relieving heat rash.
sentences.chinese: 有时好像小苏打能做任何事，当然对减轻痱子也有效。

sentences.english: What method can treat prickly heat?
sentences.chinese: 有什么办法可以治疗痱子？

sentences.english: If he wears hats, the rash may spread across his scalp or forehead.
sentences.chinese: 如果有戴帽子，痱子也可能出现在前额的头皮上。

sentences.english: The finale was warmed lotion and baby powder.
sentences.chinese: 最后敷上温暧的护肤液和痱子粉。

sentences.english: A heat rash, for example, is one of the problems that can make you feel really uncomfortable.
sentences.chinese: 像痱子就是其中一种很不舒服的皮肤问题。

sentences.english: The most common type, known as prickly heat, results when sweat escapes into the epidermis.
sentences.chinese: 最常见的一型，即痱子，因汗液溢入表皮内而导致。

sentences.english: Mum, if we shower after sweating in a hot day, then we will not get heat rashes.
sentences.chinese: 妈妈，天气热了出汗就要洗澡，这样就不会长痱子了。

sentences.english: What method can prevent grow prickly heat?
sentences.chinese: 有什么办法可以防止长痱子？

sentences.english: Heat rash rises on his back.

definition: common name for 花斑癣, tinea versicolor
tinea cruris, fungal skin infection of the groin/dermatomycosis, esp. sexually transmitted/jock itch
